page.title: 07LEEDS AND BRADFORD AIRPORT
page.content: {Buildings at the airport. {Yorkshire Light:}A group that repairs, overhauls and stores aircraft;they also run in partnership with the aero club.They lease and repair aircraft for the training of their pilots. {Air Yorkshire:}a group of aviation spotters who meet every first Sunday in each month.We have talks,films photo and slide competitions.We also have a stall at Church Fenton air dis- play.{Types of companies} British Mid- land Airways,Air UK,Britannia,Air Eur- ope,Dan Air,British Airtours,RAF,JAT, Balkan,Interflugg,Corsair,Brown Air, British Airways,Wardair.{The Great Es- {cape}.On the 8th of July{G-BBAI}of British Airtours landed on runway 36. When it got to the end it over-ran. There are 3 pieces of evidence:-pilot error, landing gear collapsed,brakes failed.It left after 4 months.{TIM:LEE
